name: doge-assistant
description: A web dashboard with widgets for Sonos control and family calendar management

scripts.test:weather:e2e: npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.js --testDir=tests/weather --grep="Weather Widget E2E Tests"
scripts.test:weather:comprehensive: npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.js --testDir=tests/weather --grep="Weather Widget Complete Test Suite"
scripts.test:weather:all: npm run test:weather:unit && npm run test:weather:integration && npm run test:weather:e2e
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:calendar:all: npm run test:calendar && npm run test:calendar:e2e
